va-burial-allowance.title: Veteran's Burial Allowance
va-burial-allowance.headline: Veteran's Burial Allowance
va-burial-allowance.source.name: U.S. Department of Veteran Affairs
va-burial-allowance.summary: Assistance may be available to help with burial, funeral, and transportation costs of a deceased veteran.
va-burial-allowance.eligibility.label: The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
va-burial-allowance.eligibility.acceptab: discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
died as a result of a service-connected disability/illness
died while receiving/traveling to VA care
died while receiving/eligible for VA compensation
va-burial-allowance.eligibility.label1: The deceased's funeral/burial was within the last two years.
